item.title: Traffic light phasing needs very slight tweak, 16th July
item.description:
When the lights on the eastern side of the C&G roundabout are on green for westbound traffic on the Barnwood by-pass from Hucclecote most traffic gets through the next set at the southern end of the C&G roundabout. However, there is a point where not all the eastbound traffic makes it through the lights at the southern end as these go on red. Fast-flowing traffic then has to stop. If they phased it so that these lights stayed on green just a few seconds longer to allow the last few vehicles that made it through the lights on the eastern side before they went red it would be really good. It also means fewer cars waiting at these lights before westbound traffic from the Barnwood Link Road gets to them.
Nearest road to the pin placed on the map (automatically generated by OpenStreetMap): C&G Roundabout, Hucclecote, Gloucester
Report on FixMyStreet
item.category: General road marking and stud issues
